name: Hoverball Strikers 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Choose your favorite contender and challenge your friends to a game of Hoverball, the new sport that is taking the world by storm ! Hit balls in the arena to bombard your opponents and take the lead. You'll need reflexes, strategy, and mastery to win the game and become the best Hoverball Striker!

Platform: PC 
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of player : 2 to 4
Genre : Platform Fighting Game 

Linktr.ee : https://linktr.ee/hoverballstrikers 

Producer : Gillian THOMAS
Game Art : Maxime DEFOULNY, Mathieu LIM, Romain CAMPARGUE, Orson CAPTAINSASS
Game Design : Thibaut PANCHOUT, Corentin SAMANIEGO, Hugues ANTIPHON, William REY-POMMIER
Game Design & Programming : Thibault PAGERIE, Luca GERBER, Maximilien GALEA
Game Programming : Gaëtan LEBÈGUE, Bastien RAPPENECKER, Nicolas PERRON
Music & Sound Design : Quentin ADOUE, Vinh-An BUIS
